overview: TWICE 2nd Tour: TWICELAND Zone 2: Fantasy Park is the second Asia tour held by TWICE. The first leg was held from May 18 to 20, 2018, in Jamsil Indoor Stadium, Seoul, South Korea.  On July 27, 2018, it was confirmed that the Kuala Lumpur concert has been cancelled due to safety issues in the venue.
title: TWICE 2ND TOUR -TWICELAND ZONE 2: Fantasy Park
